channel.title: Rachel & Andrew: That Podcast Thing
channel.itunes:subtitle: Internet friends Rachel Perry & Andrew Whipple host a podcast about podcasts! And friendship! But mostly podcasts!
channel.itunes:author: Rachel Perry & Andrew Whipple
channel.itunes:summary: Internet friends Rachel Perry & Andrew Whipple host a podcast about podcasts! And friendship! But mostly podcasts! Join us as we discuss every conceivable aspect of the medium of podcasts, since, you know, we've got to figure out something to say every week.
channel.description: Internet friends Rachel Perry & Andrew Whipple host a podcast about podcasts! And friendship! But mostly podcasts! Join us as we discuss every conceivable aspect of the medium of podcasts, since, you know, we've got to figure out something to say every week.
channel.itunes:keywords: podcast, podcasts, technology, media, comedy, discussion

item.title: Three, Two, One...PODCAST!
item.itunes:author: Rachel Perry & Andrew Whipple
item.itunes:subtitle: Rachel's Podcast Origin Story
item.itunes:summary:
Internet fwiends Rachel Perry and Andrew Whipple decide to start a podcast...about podcasts. It's v. meta. PLUS, in this episode, we talk about Rachel's personal podcast origin story. Doesn't that sound all super-heroic? Origin story? Rachel is basically the Batman of Podcasts.

Rachel's Podcast Of The Week: Reply All, 'DMV Nation'

Andrew's Podcast Of The Week: We Have Concerns, '200 PC'

Find Us Elsewhere:

  • Andrew's Twitter: @AndrewTheWhip
